g.text: You are Super-Mario. You need to collect all
Monsters are going to stop you on the way.
to shoot and kill them. Once they
catch you, you will die. Pick up mushrooms
as quickly as possible. If you reach the
end point before time runs out, the time
remaining will be added to your score. You
